verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. The <S%H410>Mighty<s%> <S%H430>One<s%>, God, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, And <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> unto the going down <S%H3996>thereof<s%>.
Out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, the <S%H4359>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath shined <S%H3313>forth<s%>.

Our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, and doth not keep <S%H2790>silence<s%>: A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoureth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3966>him<s%>, And it is very <S%H8175>tempestuous<s%> round about <S%H5439>him<s%>.
He <S%H7121>calleth<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5920>above<s%>, And to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that he may <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>:
Gather <S%H622><s%> my <S%H2623>saints<s%> together unto <S%H3772>me<s%>, Those that have made a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with me by <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.
And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; For <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5542>himself<s%>. [[Selah
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>; O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and I will <S%H5749>testify<s%> unto <S%H430>thee<s%>: I am God, even thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
I will not <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee for thy <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>; And thy <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> are continually before <S%H8548>me<s%>.
I will <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H6499>bullock<s%> out of thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, Nor <S%H6260>he-goats<s%> out of thy <S%H4356>folds<s%>.
For every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> is <S%H929>mine<s%>, And the cattle upon a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2042>hills<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; And the wild <S%H2123>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> are <S%H5978>mine<s%>.
If I were <S%H7456>hungry<s%>, I would not <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H8398>thee<s%>; For the world is <S%H4393>mine<s%>, and the fulness thereof.
Will I <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H47>bulls<s%>, Or <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6260>goats<s%>?
Offer <S%H2076><s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> the sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>; And <S%H7999>pay<s%> thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto the Most <S%H5945>High<s%>:
And <S%H7121>call<s%> upon me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>; I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> <S%H3513>thee<s%>, and thou shalt glorify me.

But unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, What hast thou to do to <S%H5608>declare<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, And that thou hast <S%H5375>taken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>,
Seeing thou <S%H8130>hatest<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, And <S%H7993>castest<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> behind <S%H310>thee<s%>?
When thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> a <S%H1590>thief<s%>, thou <S%H7521>consentedst<s%> with <S%H2506>him<s%>, And hast been partaker with <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>.
Thou <S%H7971>givest<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%>, And thy <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H6775>frameth<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
Thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> and <S%H1696>speakest<s%> against thy <S%H251>brother<s%>; <S%H5414>Thou<s%> <S%H1848>slanderest<s%> thine own <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>.

These things hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%>, and I kept <S%H2790>silence<s%>; Thou <S%H1819>thoughtest<s%> that I was <S%H1961>altogether<s%> such a one as <S%H3198>thyself<s%>: But I will reprove <S%H6186>thee<s%>, and set them in order before thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Now <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H7911>this<s%>, ye that forget <S%H433>God<s%>, Lest I tear you in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>, and there be none to <S%H5337>deliver<s%>:

Whoso <S%H2076>offereth<s%> the sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> <S%H3513>glorifieth<s%> <S%H7760>me<s%>; And to him that ordereth his <S%H1870>way<s%> aright Will I <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
